metadata.name: Automated Collection Command Prompt
metadata.comment: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.doc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.docx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.xls')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.xlsx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ppt')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.pptx')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.rtf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.pdf')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.txt'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('dir ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /b ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /s ')) OR lower(process.file.name) = lower('findstr.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /si ')))))

output.summary: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.
